data.text: Jehova Nyasaye biro kecho Jakobo
Ogendini nochokgi
E odiechiengʼ ma Jehova Nyasaye nomiu yweyo kuom chandruok gi masira kod twech malit,
unugo agoro ni ruodh Babulon ka uwacho niya:
Jehova Nyasaye oseturo ludh joma timbegi mono,
mane gisandogo ogendini pile gi gero
Pinje duto oyudo yweyo kod kwe
Yiend saipras kod sida mag Lebanon
Piny joma otho otuk duto
Giniwuo gi dwol achiel
Tekoni duto osedok piny nyaka ei liel,
Mano kaka isepodho kia e polo,
Ne iwacho e chunyi niya,
Anaidh malo moyombo boche polo;
To koro osedwoki piny e bur matut
Ji duto maneni biro ngʼiyi ka giwuoro,
ngʼat mane omiyo piny duto odongʼ gunda,
Ruodhi duto mag ogendini onindo komi luor,
In to osejwangʼi oko mar buri
ringreni ok noiki kaka noik ruodhi mamoko
Yieruru kamoro ma udhi negoe yawuote
Jehova Nyasaye Maratego wacho niya,
“Abiro loko kar dakne ochal gi kar dak tula,
Jehova Nyasaye Maratego osingore niya,
Abiro tieko jo-Asuria manie pinya,
Ma e chenro mabiro timore ne piny ngima;
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye Maratego
Wachni nofwenyore e higa mane ruoth Ahaz othoe.
Kik ubed gi mor un jo-Filistia
Joma odhier moloyo e kind jodhier noyud kuonde kwath
Dengi, yaye in rangach! Go nduru, yaye in dala maduongʼ!
Dwoko mane ma onego omi
